flawed_nl_solution:
He increases the length to 13+2=<<13+2=15>>15 feet
He increases the width to 18+2=<<18+2=16>>16 feet
So the rooms are 15*16=<<15*16=240>>240 square feet
So he has 1+3=<<1+3=4>>4 rooms of this size
So he has 4*240=<<4*240=960>>960 square feet of rooms this size
He also has one room of size 240*2=<<240*2=480>>480 square feet
So he has 960+480=<<960+480=1440>>1440 square feet of rooms
#### 1440

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
